Description: Leather belt or strap in two separate pieces. The larger part of the object is a leather strap with two belt loops decorated with embossed crosses. Broken off at both ends. The other piece consists of one end of the belt strap pierced by a split ending in a circular hole through which has been passed a double plaited leather thong with a thickened terminal.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
